availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, peddler. Native of Germany. Married to Regina Martz Rosenbaum in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on July 23, 1855. Married to Celia Knorr in Jefferson County on August 8, 1859. Resident of Jefferson County in 1859. Indicted in the Jefferson Circuit Court for receiving stolen goods on May 8, 1860. Indicted in the Jefferson Circuit Court for receiving stolen goods on May 8, 1860. Peddler in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
"Circuit Court,” The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), May 9, 1860.
"Important Arrests,” The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), Jan. 18, 1860.
"Jefferson Circuit Court,” The Louisville Daily Journal (Louisville, Ky.), May 15, 1860.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994040, Jefferson County Marriages, p. 101, 155, 159.
Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 ed. Henry Tanner (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 209.
KYR-0001-021-0013.
